ComicInfo.Summary: As if The Astounding Wolf-Man didn't already have enough to worry about--here comes TRIPLE THREAT! Are they here to hurt him--or HELP him? This issue sets the stage for the next dramatic arc in the life of Gary Hampton, The Astounding Wolf-Man!

ComicInfo.Title: Introducing Triple Threat
